title: Second Contact
synopsis: Ensigns Mariner and Boimler are tasked with a seemingly mundane mission that turns chaotic, highlighting the everyday challenges aboard the USS Cerritos.

title: Envoys
synopsis: Mariner and Boimler are sent on a diplomatic mission that leads to unexpected complications, testing their abilities and patience.

title: Temporal Edict
synopsis: Captain Freeman enforces a new efficiency protocol that causes unrest among the crew, while Mariner and Boimler deal with the fallout.

title: Moist Vessel
synopsis: The Cerritos encounters an alien ship filled with water-based life forms, leading to strange and humorous situations.

title: Cupid's Errant Arrow
synopsis: A visit to a planet with a romantic holiday leads to complications for Mariner and Boimler, while the rest of the crew faces their own challenges.

title: Terminal Provocations
synopsis: The crew faces a dangerous situation when they are sent to resolve a conflict at a remote outpost, leading to unexpected twists.

title: Much Ado About Boimler
synopsis: Boimler’s attempt to prove himself leads to a series of comedic mishaps, while Mariner deals with a rival crew member.

title: Veritas
synopsis: The crew is summoned to a mysterious trial where they must recount their recent adventures, leading to revelations and misunderstandings.

title: Crisis Point
synopsis: Mariner takes on a holodeck simulation to address her frustrations, leading to a wild adventure that puts her relationships to the test.

title: No Small Parts
synopsis: The season finale sees the crew face a major threat that puts their skills and teamwork to the ultimate test.

title: Strange Energies
synopsis: The Cerritos encounters an anomaly that affects the crew in strange ways, leading to a series of bizarre and comedic events.

title: Kayshon, His Eyes Open
synopsis: The crew teams up with a Kzinti warrior to tackle a dangerous mission, leading to unexpected alliances and challenges.

title: Mining the Mind’s Mine
synopsis: A mission to a mining colony leads to conflicts and complications as the crew uncovers hidden truths about the operation.

title: I, Excretus
synopsis: The crew is put through an intensive simulation that pushes their skills and patience to the limit.

title: An Embarrassment of Dooplers
synopsis: The crew encounters a species with a unique problem, leading to a comedic and complex situation as they try to resolve it.

title: The Spy Humongous
synopsis: Mariner and Boimler uncover a secret plot that threatens the safety of the ship, leading to a series of dramatic and humorous events.

title: Where Pleasant Fountains Lie
synopsis: A trip to a planetary amusement park takes an unexpected turn, leading to comedic and dramatic situations.

title: The Great Starship Race
synopsis: The crew participates in a high-stakes starship race that tests their skills and relationships, with surprising outcomes.

title: Last Chance to See
synopsis: The crew must face the consequences of their actions as they deal with a critical situation that affects their future.

title: First First Contact
synopsis: The season finale sees the crew dealing with the ramifications of a first contact mission gone awry, leading to major changes.

title: Grounded
synopsis: The crew faces the consequences of a previous mission as they deal with new challenges on a planet where they're stranded.

title: The Stars at Night
synopsis: A diplomatic mission goes awry, leading the crew to navigate political intrigue and personal dilemmas.

title: I, Excretus
synopsis: The crew faces a series of challenges and tests as they continue their mission, leading to surprising revelations and personal growth.

title: In the Cradle of Eternity
synopsis: A visit to an ancient planet reveals hidden dangers and forgotten mysteries that test the crew's abilities and resolve.

title: The Longest Trek
synopsis: The crew embarks on a perilous journey that pushes their endurance and teamwork to the limit.

title: The Galactic Race
synopsis: The crew competes in a high-stakes race across the galaxy, facing numerous obstacles and rivalries.

title: Shattered Dreams
synopsis: A mission goes awry, causing the crew to confront their deepest fears and personal issues.

title: The Time Paradox
synopsis: The crew faces a temporal anomaly that disrupts their mission and threatens to unravel their reality.

title: The Unity Project
synopsis: The crew works to resolve a conflict between warring factions, seeking a peaceful resolution and forging new alliances.

title: New Horizons
synopsis: The season finale sees the crew navigating a major crisis that will determine their future and the fate of the galaxy.

title: Space Bounty
synopsis: The crew is hired to track down a fugitive across the galaxy, leading to unexpected alliances and challenges.

title: The Forgotten Colony
synopsis: The crew discovers a long-lost colony that holds secrets vital to their mission and the Federation's history.

title: Quantum Quandaries
synopsis: The crew deals with a quantum anomaly that disrupts their reality and challenges their understanding of space-time.

title: The Cosmic Threat
synopsis: The Enterprise faces an existential threat from a powerful entity seeking to destroy the galaxy.

title: The Mysterious Artifact
synopsis: The crew encounters a powerful artifact that holds the key to a major discovery, leading to dangerous and exciting consequences.

title: The Federation's Gamble
synopsis: The crew must navigate political intrigue and conflict as they work to secure a crucial alliance for the Federation.

title: The Rogue Ship
synopsis: The crew tracks down a rogue starship that poses a significant threat to Federation security and stability.

title: The Lost Worlds
synopsis: The Enterprise explores uncharted worlds that hold ancient mysteries and hidden dangers.

title: Echoes of the Past
synopsis: The crew encounters remnants of a past civilization that reveal secrets about their current mission and the galaxy’s history.

title: A New Dawn
synopsis: The season finale brings major revelations and decisions that will shape the future of the Federation and the galaxy.
